blog.name: lovely-lesbian-luna
blog.title: All Your Faves are Gay
blog.description: Sammy | he/they | nb lesbian | 18 | 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 | icon by @ahfuckforgottobestraight

summary: I was looking up some info on pansy and When the final battle of the Second Wizarding War broke out at Hogwarts on 2 May, 1998...
body:
I was looking up some info on pansy and

When the final battle of the Second Wizarding War broke out at Hogwarts on 2 May, 1998 Pansy spoke up in favour of turning Harry Potter over to Lord Voldemort. This reaction caused the majority of her schoolmates to draw their wands upon her in Harry’s defence.

It can be assumed that Pansy survived the Second Wizarding War, as she left the Great Hall with the other Slytherins before the Battle of Hogwarts broke out and most likely did not return to the castle to fight

—

“Ooh, sticking up for Longbottom? Never thought you’d like fat little crybabies, Parvati." 

—

”Hey, Johnson, what’s with that hairstyle, anyway? Why would anyone want to look like they’ve got worms coming out of their head?“ (referring to Angelina’s dreadlocks) 

she’s is literally a fatphobic racist, both wizard and normal so… maybe…  at least think critically about shipping her with Hermione, especially if you hc Hermione as black… cuz then you are literally shipping a racist with someone who’s black which is… and maybe don’t hc her as a person of colour? maybe just… don’t fuss over her. like at all? maybe turn that attention to actual characters of colour? maybe

blog.name: miko2495
blog.title: My main headquaters
blog.description: This is where I post the random stuff that comes to my head

summary: So, Saffron is about to learn the Vermillion charm (I think) and I cannot help but feel like Ben’s reaction is a little... off....
caption: So, Saffron is about to learn the Vermillion charm (I think) and I cannot help but feel like Ben’s reaction is a little… off. With him being scared of pretty much everything, you’d think he’d be scared of the red sparks, not cheering.

body:
Fandom Questions

Rules: Choose any three fandoms (in random order) and answer the questions, then tag some friends.

Tagged by: @tabbytabbytabby 😘

I choose:

1. Teen Wolf

2. All American

3. Harry Potter

The first character you loved:

1. Isaac Lahey

2. Olivia Baker

3. Fred&George Weasley

The character you never expected to love so much:

1. Theo Raeken, the little jerk

2. Jordan Baker

3. Sirius Black

The character you relate to the most:

1. Liam Dunbar

2. Patience

3. Cho Chang

The character you’d slap:

1. Gerard Argent

2. Coach Baker

3. Percy Weasley

Three favorite characters (in order of preference):

1. Liam Dunbar, Theo Raeken, Isaac Lahey

2. Asher Adams, Olivia Baker, Jordan Baker

3. Fred&George Weasley, Sirius Black, Scorpius Malfoy

A character you liked at first but don’t anymore:

1. Stiles Stilinski

2. Coop

3. Albus Dumbledore

A character you did not like at first but now do:

1. Kira Yukimura

2. Laura Baker

3. Ginny Weasley

Three OTPs:

1. Thiam

2. Ashivia

3. Wolfstar

Tagging: Urgh… I have no time for this *flips hair* (no seriously, I have no time) so I will just say: Feel yourself tagged guys! 😊

blog.name: ununquadius
blog.title: Drarry Chats (Mostly)
blog.description: AO3: ununquadius  // Follows, comments and likes from azaharperezoso Feel free to correct my mistakes, English is not my first language | Header by @cubedcoffeecake

summary:
Harry: Wow, thanks so much for this present, Hermione. I love you
Draco: Ahem
Harry: I love you as a friend and nothing more,...
body:
Harry: Wow, thanks so much for this present, Hermione. I love you
Draco: Ahem
Harry: I love you as a friend and nothing more, because the love of my life is Draco and Draco alone

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Wow, thanks so much for this present, Hermione. I love you

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: I love you as a friend and nothing more, because the love of my life is Draco and Draco alone

summary:
Fic 0 -> infinity
This one.
NOTES:
I suppose it’s okay, but some of the characters have too many virtues, others too many flaws....
body:
Fic 0 -> infinity

This one.

NOTES:

I suppose it’s okay, but some of the characters have too many virtues, others too many flaws. There are good points made, however, when it goes overboard the story suffers.

Draco (all the Malfoys) is annoyingly patronizing, it gets chalked up to his worries about safety, but in my head the bells ring.

I am currently at the chapter 20, not sure if I want to continue.

The idea of seeing magical bonds was awesome. It also had some well made points.

- - -

Ha, now I know what it reminds me of - twilight! Not twilight per se but ‘les ames vagabondes’ (french translation of the host) - the feeling is the same.

Does Stephenie Meyer write ff?

blog.name: remylupins
blog.title: marauders shit
blog.description:
wonderful profile picture by naercissa!

wolfstar drabbles and oneshots

feel free to send requests :)

tags: its 2am and I'm too tired to proof-read this
ill make one for James and sirius too
THIS TUMBLR FONT THING IS MAKING ME WANT TO DIE STOP
body:
A Study

Remus Lupin was pretty. Not sexy, hot, or beautiful. Just pretty. 

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

He had soft brown eyes that shined with flecks of amber in the sun. He always complained about his eyes, saying they made him look too “wolfy” but Sirius would tell him that his eyes were pretty so he stayed quiet. 

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

His hair fell in soft tawny waves, long on the top and short at the sides, and almost covered his eyes. They were soft and smelled of the shampoo at Hogwarts and when you brushed your hand through them they would bounce back. 

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Pink scars laid gently on snow white skin. He hated his scars, daily reminders of everything he hated and despises, but James called them ‘badass’ and Sirius said they made him look cool so he didn’t complain. 

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

His smiles was crooked and his canine teeth were sharper than most and when he laughed his whole body shook.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

He wore jumpers over dress shirts. Jackets with elbow patches, mismatched socks, and scruffy shoes. He smelt of coffee and books, old buildings and vanilla. His fingers were always covered in ink and a quill always perched behind his ear.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

He was lanky and long not strong or muscular. His voice was high, not deep. His eyes too big for his face or his jaw too sharp. His body was covered in scars, scattered in moles, and dusted with ink. His smile nor white or perfect, his clothing cheap and shabby, his face too hollow and tired.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

So no, Remus was not hot, sexy, or gorgeous. Some might tell you he was too tall or skinny, to pale with dark rings around his eyes. That his scars were frightening and daunting. But to his friends he was perfect. He was pretty and beautiful, his smile lighting up rooms and humor sharp and witty. His clothing soft and comfy, his bags full of chocolate and treats. He loved his friends and his friends loved him and that was enough for him. 

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

He was enough.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Hi, could I please have a Marauders Era and Marvel ship please? I’m a straight girl, 5’7. I have auburn hair and green eyes,...
question: Hi, could I please have a Marauders Era and Marvel ship please? I’m a straight girl, 5’7. I have auburn hair and green eyes, three tattoos and a lip piercing. I love to read, watch movie, listen to music (all kinds) and my dog. I am a hufflepuff and will speak out if someone I love is hurt. I'm a little shy and clumsy but I'm also funny, curious and ambitious.  All my friends say I'm very good at making people laugh. Thankyou so much, I love your blog! 🧡🧡
answer:
(Ty so much hun 💕💕)

I ship you with….

Regulus Black

Steve Rogers

tags: harry potter and the cursed child
summary:
Harry Potter and the Cursed Child OTPs: Draco & Astoria
"Lucius and Narcissa had "disapproved" of Draco's choice to take her as...
body:
Harry Potter and the Cursed Child OTPs: Draco & Astoria

“Lucius and Narcissa had "disapproved” of Draco’s choice to take her as a wife, but he chose her anyway and stood up to both of them. This was something which Astoria once told her son “was one of the most courageous things she’d ever seen.” Frail, and knowing she was not destined for old age due to her ancestor’s blood borne curse, Astoria longed for a child so that Draco, after her eventual death, would not be alone.“
